```


## Missing Value Visualization

suicide %>% 
  vis_miss()
```

```{r}
suicide %>% 
  gg_miss_var(show_pct = T)
```



## Histogram of  Variables

```{r}
suicide %>%
  dplyr::select(h1su1,h3to130,h4se1) %>% 
  keep(is.numeric) %>% 
  gather() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(value)) +
    facet_wrap(~ key, scales = "free") +
    geom_histogram()
```
```{r}
colnames(suicide)
```

```{r}

#par(mfrow = c(2,2))

a <- suicide %>% 
  group_by(h1su1) %>% 
  summarise(n = n())

b <- suicide %>% 
  group_by(h3to130) %>% 
  summarise(n = n())

c <- suicide %>% 
  group_by(h4se1) %>% 
  summarise(n = n())

d <- suicide %>% 
  group_by(h5mn8) %>% 
  summarise(n = n())


par(mfrow = c(2,2))
barplot(a$n, names.arg = c("0","1","6","8","9"), main = "h1su1")
barplot(b$n, names.arg = c("0","1","8","7","6","9","missed"), main = "h3to130")
barplot(c$n, names.arg = c("0","1","6","7","8","missed"), main = "h4se1")
barplot(d$n, names.arg = c("0","1","missed"), main = "h5mn8")


```

# Visualization of Suicide

```{r}

suicide_sub_1 <- suicide %>% 
  dplyr::select(h1su1)

suicide_sub_2 <- suicide %>% 
  dplyr::select(h3to130)

suicide_sub_3 <- suicide %>% 
  dplyr::select(h4se1)


suicide_sub_1 <- data.frame(lapply(suicide_sub_1, factor, ordered=TRUE, 
                          levels=1:5, 
                          labels=c("0","1","6","8","9")))


suicide_sub_2 <- data.frame(lapply(suicide_sub_2, factor, ordered=TRUE, 
                          levels=1:6, 
                          labels=c("0","1","6","7","8","9")))

suicide_sub_3 <- data.frame(lapply(suicide_sub_1, factor, ordered=TRUE, 
                          levels=1:5, 
                          labels=c("0","1","6","7","8")))
```



```{r}
plot(likert(suicide_sub_1),
     type="heat",
           low.color = "white",
           high.color = "blue",
           text.color = "black",
           text.size = 4,
           wrap = 50)
```


```{r}
plot(likert(suicide_sub_1),
     type="density",
           facet = TRUE,
           bw = 0.5)
```
